org.middleheaven.process.web.server
Class ServletWebContext

java.lang.Object
  org.middleheaven.process.web.server.WebContext
      org.middleheaven.process.web.server.ServletWebContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpServerContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
RequestResponseWebContext, TagContext
public abstract class ServletWebContext
extends WebContext

A WebContext that maps to ServletRequest and ServletResponse objects. This WebContext is used when the application runs in a web container.

getCulture

public Culture getCulture()
The most likely Culture accepted by the user agent. Selects the most preferable Culture according to the rules of the Accept-Language HTTP header.

Returns:
The most likely Culture accepted by the user agent.

getCultures

public java.util.List<Culture> getCultures()
The list of Cultures accepted by the user agent. The list is ordered according to rules of the Accept-Language HTTP header.

Returns:
a list of accepted Cultures.
